/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of white and beige, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
